articles.author: Samer Al-Atrush, David Pilling, Andres Schipani, Aanu Adeoye
articles.title: Wagner's future in Africa in question after Russian mutiny - Financial Times
articles.description: Mercenary group’s operations have played pivotal role in countries including Mali, Libya and CAR
articles.content: For years Yevgeny Prigozhins Wagner Group has been the main vehicle of Russias power projection in Africa, engaging in military, mining and propaganda activities across the continent from Libya and S… [+7414 chars]
